description: False grout joints are pretty cool. I cut this one using my grinder and diamond blade. Minor chipping can be polished. The benefit is twofold: it keeps the tile strong and prevents it from bowing out due to downward pressure. This full tile shower video series from start-to-finish is available inside our Video Library at homerepairtutor.com
title: Unique Tile Shower Tip (False Grout Joint) - #shorts #homerepairtutor
